results.full_response:
Our warranty policy offers you complete peace of mind! Here are the key details:

- **Warranty Duration:** Most GREST devices come with a standard 6-month warranty from the purchase date, with an option to extend for an additional 6 months at ₹1,499.
- **Coverage:** Our warranty covers:
  - Software issues
  - Functional problems (like speaker and microphone issues)
  - Hardware defects due to manufacturing errors

- **Exclusions:** The warranty does not cover:
  - Physical and display damage
  - Water damage
  - Unauthorized repairs
  - Accessories (like chargers) unless they have manufacturing defects

- **Claim Process:** If you need to claim warranty service, you can contact us via:
  - Phone: +91 92665 22338
  - Email: care@grest.in
  - Through our website: [Contact Us](https://grest.in/pages/contact-us)

Our warranty remains valid across India, ensuring support wherever you are. If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out!

---

*Here are some helpful links:*
[Warranty](https://grest.in/pages/warranty-policy) | [FAQs](https://grest.in/pages/faqs)

results.full_response:
Hamare return policy mein aapko asani se replacement process ka option milta hai. Yahan par kuch important points hain:

- **Replacement Request:** Aap 7 din ke andar replacement request file kar sakte hain.
- **Damaged/Missing Product:** Is case mein, return request 48 hours ke andar file karni hogi.
- **Request Conditions:** Replacement request sirf tab accept hoti hai jab:
  - Galat product — wrong color/size/style
  - Galat item order/deliver kiya gaya
  - Defective product — manufacturing defect/non-functioning
  - Damaged product — physical damage/tampered product
  - Ghalat quantity — missing products/parts

- **Return/Replacement Request Nahi Accept Hoga:**
  - Agar product alter/use kiya gaya ho
  - Original packaging ke bina product return kiya gaya ho
  - Serial number tampered hai

Agar aapko aur information chahiye ya replacement request file karni hai, to aap [Contact Us](https://grest.in/pages/contact-us) par humse sampark kar sakte hain! 😊

---

*Feel free to explore more:*
[Return Policy](https://grest.in/pages/refund-policy) | [FAQs](https://grest.in/pages/faqs)

results.full_response:
Delivery is a smooth and reliable process with us! 📦 Here’s how it works:

- **Free Delivery:** We provide free standard shipping across India.
- **Processing Time:** Your order is usually processed within 24-48 hours after confirmation.
- **Delivery Time:** Typically takes 4–6 business days, depending on your location. Metro cities often receive faster deliveries.
- **Secure Packaging:** All our products are packed in secure, tamper-proof packaging to ensure they arrive safe and ready to use.
- **Order Tracking:** Once shipped, you'll receive a tracking ID to follow your package in real time.

If you have any other queries related to delivery, feel free to [Contact Us](https://grest.in/pages/contact-us)!

- **Free Delivery:** We deliver all orders across India at no extra cost.
- **Best Prices:** Our refurbished devices are available at prices much lower than new devices!

- **50+ Quality Checks**: Every device undergoes over 50 rigorous tests to ensure it meets our high standards for performance and reliability. 

- **12-Month Warranty**: All our products come with a full year of warranty coverage, providing you peace of mind with your purchase.

- **7-Day Hassle-Free Replacement**: If you're not satisfied within the first week, you can easily return the device for a hassle-free replacement.

- **Free Delivery**: We offer free delivery on all orders across India, making it convenient for you to receive your refurbished device.

- **Genuine Products**: We guarantee that all our devices are 100% authentic Apple products, so you know you’re getting the best quality.

- **Best Prices**: Our prices are significantly lower than new devices, giving you access to premium quality at a more affordable rate.

results.query: Fair aur Superb condition mein kya farak hai?
results.response_preview:
Great question! 😊 Fair aur superb condition ke beech mein kuch important differences hain:

### **Fair Condition:**
- **Cosmetic Condition:** Noticeable scratches, scuffs, or visible wear; marks on the frame or screen are clearly visible.
- **Battery Health:** 80% and above.
- **Performance:** Fully...
results.full_response:
Great question! 😊 Fair aur superb condition ke beech mein kuch important differences hain:

### **Fair Condition:**
- **Cosmetic Condition:** Noticeable scratches, scuffs, or visible wear; marks on the frame or screen are clearly visible.
- **Battery Health:** 80% and above.
- **Performance:** Fully functional, but appearance may not be perfect. Yeh condition un logon ke liye best hai jo budget-conscious hain aur sirf reliable device chahte hain.

### **Superb Condition:**
- **Cosmetic Condition:** Appears almost new; may have extremely faint, hardly noticeable hairline scratches; no dents or major signs of previous use.
- **Battery Health:** 85% and above.
- **Performance:** 100% functional, passes every diagnostic test. Yeh condition un logon ke liye hai jo premium experience chahte hain ya kisi ko gift dena chahte hain.

In summary, **Fair Condition** devices have more visible wear but are still fully functional, while **Superb Condition** devices look almost new and are in better cosmetic shape. Kya aapko kisi specific device mein interest hai? 😊

---

results.response_preview:
Sure! Here's the breakdown of the differences between **Good** and **Superb** condition for our refurbished devices:

### **Good Condition:**

- **Battery Health:** 80% and above.
- **Performa...
results.full_response:
Sure! Here's the breakdown of the differences between **Good** and **Superb** condition for our refurbished devices:

### **Good Condition:**
- **Cosmetic Condition:** Light signs of use, may have minor scratches or scuffs that are barely noticeable.
- **Battery Health:** 80% and above.
- **Performance:** Fully functional with no impact on speed, camera, or overall functionality.
- **Best for:** Everyday users and budget-conscious buyers who want reliability at a lower price.

### **Superb Condition:**
- **Cosmetic Condition:** Like-new appearance with minimal to no visible wear; may have extremely faint, hardly noticeable hairline scratches.
- **Battery Health:** 85% and above.
- **Performance:** Excellent, smooth performance, fully functional.
- **Best for:** Buyers seeking a premium experience, long-term use, or gifting purposes without paying full price for a new device.

Both condition types ensure you receive a high-quality product with our thorough quality checks! If you have any specific device in mind, let us know and we can provide more details!
